/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A lamppost stands sentinel on the right side of the street, its light likely casting a warm glow when night falls. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a soft, natural light. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
